name: Eldritch Pandemic Prevention Agency
description:
Welcome to the Earth 2 reloaded project. The Earth has been wiped out by COVID-19 and Eldritch Space Inc. designed a new planet. You are a sanitary Operator in charge of filtering who's able to enter Earth 2. Get your QR Code Reader ready and experience the stressing job of filtering a diverse amount of alien species.

Please read the Operator's Manual before starting the Game. Have a great and productive day from our friends at Eldritch Pandemic Prevention Agency, a division of Eldritch Space Inc.

Controls:

As easy as point and click
